meanings.definition: A soft murmuring or rustling sound.
meanings.sent1: The susurration of the leaves in the gentle breeze was soothing.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the susurration of the river as it flowed peacefully.
meanings.sent3: The susurration of the crowd at the concert made it hard to hear the music.
meanings.sent4: The susurration of the wind through the trees was like nature's lullaby.
meanings.sent5: The susurration of the rain on the roof put me to sleep instantly.

meanings.definition: The act of whispering or murmuring.
meanings.sent1: She engaged in susurration with her friend during the class.
meanings.sent2: The susurration of secrets in the hallway was intriguing.
meanings.sent3: The susurration of gossip in the office was hard to ignore.
meanings.sent4: The susurration of the wind carried their conversation away.
meanings.sent5: The susurration of the leaves seemed to echo their hushed conversation.
